values: 自吹自擂；引以为豪的事物（或原因）
To boast is to talk about how great one is.
We all became tired of listening to him boast about himself all day.
n. a statement in which you express too much pride in yourself or in something you have, have done, or are connected to in some way 吹嘘，自夸
